message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Can you meet me in the middle at $9,500?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is still a little lower than what I'm looking for.  How about we split the difference and go with $10,250? It's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $9,000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
